sources.title: Fighting Deputy
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Fighting Deputy (1937) FRED SCOTT
sources.description:
Stars: Fred Scott, Phoebe Logan, Al St. John
 Director: Sam Newfield

 The Sheriff and his deputies are after Scar Adams. Scar is the brother of Alice Denton, the girl Deputy Tom plans to marry, and when the Sheriff is wounded she makes Tom refuse the job of Sheriff. But when Scar kills his father, Tom puts on the badge and takes out after him.

metadata.Plot: The Sheriff and his deputies are after Scar Adams. Scar is the brother of Alice Denton, the girl Deputy Tom plans to marry, and when the Sheriff is wounded she makes Tom refuse the job of Sheriff. But when Scar kills his father, Tom puts on the badge and takes out after him.
